div.p: I wanted to be a dancer, I wanted to be on the West End stage or in music videos that was the ambition...
You see the dream was to be on the West End stage or be a movie star and all the rest of it and I’m glad for that because if I didn’t have those
big dreams I wouldn’t aspire to be who I am and what I have today and so you know having those dreams have got me onto College
which then led onto Uni but I think when I came out of University I was an adult so my outlook in life is different so therefore I thought,
you know, logically what am I going to do if that dream doesn’t come true so then I then set up my street dance company
and I earn money, I get to do what I want, you know, my chosen career and I get to meet and work with loads of young people
in my community so, again, I suppose I’m a winner.
